node.detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，無外遊記錄，沒有病徵。8 月 11 日因發燒及肺炎入院接受治療，其後確診。患者經治療後情況好轉，病毒抗體呈陽性，惟病人其後因末期癌病而病情持續惡化，延至 9 月 12 日早上 6 時 25 分離世。家人為第 #4235 宗個案患者。
node.detail_en: The patient has underlying health conditions, no recent travel history and had no symptoms. On Aug 11, he was hospitalized due to fever and was later diagnosed positive. After treatment, his condition improved and he tested positive for virus antibodies, however his condition later deteriorated due to terminal cancer. He passed away on Sept 12 at 6:25am. Patient #4235 is his family member.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者
